content.title: Configure the Account Service
content.body:
1. From the top-left corner of the window, click the service name.
  2. In the Name box, type AccountStorage.
  3. Under Sample Data, drag the Accounts.zip file from the extracted files.
  4. Click Save.
  5. Close the Edit Object Service window.
    It may take some time for Iris to add the service to the Project Services section.
